subsection.name: Prerequisites
subsection.p: These instruction assumes that you have maven 3 installed

subsection.name: Installing into your project
subsection.p: Specify the version in the properties section of your project:
Add CMS plugin to your project:
Add repository plugin to your project (since 1.03.00):
Add HST plugin to your project:
subsection.source: <filter> <filter-name>RewriteFilter</filter-name> <filter-class>org.onehippo.forge.rewriting.HippoRewriteFilter</filter-class> <!-- sets up log level (will be logged to context log) can be: TRACE, DEBUG, INFO (default), WARN, ERROR, FATAL, log4j, commons, slf4j, sysout:{level} (ie, sysout:DEBUG) if you are having trouble using normal levels use sysout:DEBUG (default WARN) --> <init-param> <param-name>logLevel</param-name> <param-value>slf4j</param-value> </init-param> <!-- you can disable status page if desired can be: true, false (default true) --> <init-param> <param-name>statusEnabled</param-name> <param-value>true</param-value> </init-param> <!-- you can change status path so that it does not conflict with your installed apps (note, defaults to /rewrite-status) note, must start with / --> <init-param> <param-name>statusPath</param-name> <param-value>/rewrite-status</param-value> </init-param> <init-param> <param-name>statusEnabledOnHosts</param-name> <param-value>localhost, 127.0.0.*, *.lan, *.local</param-value> </init-param> <init-param> <param-name>rulesLocation</param-name> <param-value>/content/urlrewriter</param-value> </init-param> </filter>
subsection.p: Add filter as a first entry in your web.xml before the other filter mappings:
Copy urlrewriting-context.xml to the following location within your project: ..site/src/main/resources/META-INF/hst-assembly/overrides/

subsection.name: Example Demo Project Location
subsection.p: If you do not want to put this plugin directly into your project you might want to checkout the demo project.
subsection.em: Note: You can check out, build and run a demo as follows:
subsection.source: $ svn co https://forge.onehippo.org/svn/urlrewriter/demo/trunk urlrewriter-demo $ cd urlrewriter-demo $ mvn clean install $ mvn -P cargo.run
